remarks: An indexed union of a disjoint collection of disjoint collections is disjoint if each component is disjoint, and the disjoint unions in the collection are also disjoint.  Note that ` B ( y ) ` and ` C ( x ) ` may have the displayed free variables.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
statement:
disjxiun $p |- ( Disj_ y e. A B -> ( Disj_ x e. U_ y e. A B C <-> ( A. y e. A Disj_ x e. B C /\ Disj_ y e. A U_ x e. B C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d C y $.
